karten.name: Ignarus, the Flame Caller
karten.beschreibung: A hot-blooded warrior from the lava lands whose sword glows like the sun. He fearlessly charges into any battle.
karten.funktion: When attacking, deal +2 damage against Earth cards.

karten.name: Pyra, the Ash Queen
karten.beschreibung: A cunning fire sorceress who creates illusions from glowing ash. Her enemies quickly lose track of reality.
karten.funktion: Reduces the opponent's intelligenz by -2 if they are Water.

karten.name: Vulkanor, the Earthsplitter
karten.beschreibung: Born from the heart of a volcano, he unleashes explosive power with every strike.
karten.funktion: Once per game, he can instantly defeat an opponent if their verteidigung is less than 4.

karten.name: Funka, the Flame Child
karten.beschreibung: A curious fire spirit who loves to play with embers. Quick, cheeky, and unpredictable.
karten.funktion: When drawing, look at two cards and keep one.

karten.name: Krax, the Firebird
karten.beschreibung: A mystical bird with glowing feathers that traces fire trails across the sky.
karten.funktion: Cannot be attacked by Air cards.

karten.name: Brandak, the Berserker
karten.beschreibung: A roaring fighter who goes into a rage when wounded.
karten.funktion: Gains +2 staerke if struck in the previous round.

karten.name: Gluthain, the Smith
karten.beschreibung: A wise blacksmith who forges magical weapons from molten ore.
karten.funktion: Permanently increases the staerke of any own card by +1.

karten.name: Fiora, the Fire Jumper
karten.beschreibung: An acrobat who moves through the air like a flame.
karten.funktion: Has a 50% chance to dodge enemy attacks.

karten.name: Magmar, the Enraged
karten.beschreibung: An angry fire golem who blindly charges at his foes.
karten.funktion: Automatically attacks even if not chosen.

karten.name: Luma, the Light Flame
karten.beschreibung: A radiant being with healing flames. She brings light to the darkness.
karten.funktion: Heals any own card by +3 verteidigung.

karten.name: Scarn, the Inferno Caller
karten.beschreibung: Masters the art of summoning firestorms out of nothing.
karten.funktion: Removes an Air card from the game when he attacks it.

karten.name: Nerak, the Flame Striker
karten.beschreibung: A loyal warrior with a burning lance, always ready for battle.
karten.funktion: If played together with an Earth card, both gain +1 strength.

karten.name: Ashara, the Ember Seer
karten.beschreibung: Her eyes see the future in the embers. Her wisdom burns deeper than flames.
karten.funktion: May preview an opponent's move and swap one card.

karten.name: Sirena, the Deep Guardian
karten.beschreibung: This mystical mermaid guards ancient secrets in the depths. Her songs bewilder her enemies.
karten.funktion: When defending, reduces the attacker’s strength by -2.

karten.name: Aqualon, the Current Master
karten.beschreibung: A wise ruler of ocean currents who can mislead entire fleets.
karten.funktion: Swaps the position of any two cards on the field.

karten.name: Corala, the Pearl Priestess
karten.beschreibung: A healer whose prayers can calm the ocean itself. Her wisdom protects her allies.
karten.funktion: Increases the defense of all Water cards by +1 while she is in play.

karten.name: Maru, the Wave Runner
karten.beschreibung: A fast fighter who runs on the water's surface as if it were solid ground.
karten.funktion: Gains +2 speed when used against Fire.

karten.name: Kiel, the Harpooner
karten.beschreibung: An experienced hunter who bravely defeats even sea monsters with precision.
karten.funktion: Deals +2 damage against Air cards.

karten.name: Neria, the Drop Sorceress
karten.beschreibung: A silent mage whose spells unleash power through fine droplets.
karten.funktion: Forces the opponent to discard a card when played.

karten.name: Deepwrath, the Leviathan
karten.beschreibung: An ancient beast rising from the dark depths to devour everything.
karten.funktion: Can attack two cards at once.

karten.name: Blix, the Bubble Sprite
karten.beschreibung: A playful water spirit who tricks enemies with bubbles and pranks.
karten.funktion: Opponent loses their ability this round.

karten.name: Ondara, the Tide Bringer
karten.beschreibung: Her steps summon the tides. She is as powerful as the sea itself.
karten.funktion: All other cards lose 1 speed this round.

karten.name: Rakal, the Sea Baron
karten.beschreibung: A noble strategist of the seas who commands his troops with clear mind.
karten.funktion: Allows you to recover a card from the discard pile.

karten.name: Schauma, the Soap Elf
karten.beschreibung: Her slippery form makes opponents slip and make mistakes.
karten.funktion: When attacked, opponent must roll a die: on 1–3, the attack fails.

karten.name: Tränk, the Brewmaster
karten.beschreibung: A mad alchemist whose water brews have surprising effects.
karten.funktion: Apply a random +2 or -2 effect to an opponent’s card.

karten.name: Nokta, the Mist Sister
karten.beschreibung: Wrapped in mist, she sneaks across the battlefield. Barely seen, already gone.
karten.funktion: Cannot be attacked in the next round.

karten.name: Terron, the Rock King
karten.beschreibung: A mighty ruler of the mountains, as immovable as stone and as powerful as a landslide.
karten.funktion: Takes no damage in the first round.

karten.name: Gaia, the Root Mother
karten.beschreibung: The wise guardian of the forest, who speaks with nature and gives life.
karten.funktion: Increases defense of all Earth cards by +1 while in play.

karten.name: Brak, the Cave Smasher
karten.beschreibung: A rough giant from the depths of the mountains, wielding a boulder as a club.
karten.funktion: Deals +2 damage against Air cards.

karten.name: Mossy, the Stone Sprite
karten.beschreibung: A small moss-covered earth spirit who can camouflage skillfully.
karten.funktion: Can make itself invulnerable for one round.

karten.name: Krolla, the Sand Runner
karten.beschreibung: Swift as the desert wind and accurate as an arrow. Her sand magic clouds all vision.
karten.funktion: Reduces an opponent's speed by -2.

karten.name: Ferrox, the Ore Shaper
karten.beschreibung: An alchemist of the earth, transforming rocks into weapons and armor.
karten.funktion: Increases strength or defense of a card by +2 (one-time use).

karten.name: Dornak, the Crust Warrior
karten.beschreibung: With armor made of lava rock, he fearlessly charges into every battle.
karten.funktion: Takes 1 less damage per attack automatically.

karten.name: Florin, the Leaf Guardian
karten.beschreibung: A peaceful guardian who calls plants to defend.
karten.funktion: Blocks one enemy attack completely.

karten.name: Kragg, the Rubble Caller
karten.beschreibung: With a roar, he summons landslides and crushes everything in his path.
karten.funktion: Reduces defense of all opponent cards by -1.

karten.name: Talra, the Crystal Seer
karten.beschreibung: She reads future and fate from crystals. Her visions are feared.
karten.funktion: May look at two cards in the opponent’s hand.

karten.name: Murok, the Mud Slinger
karten.beschreibung: A crafty fighter who causes chaos with mud and rocks.
karten.funktion: Reduces intelligence of an opponent’s card by -2.

karten.name: Bakka, the Earth Feral
karten.beschreibung: An energetic underground burrower full of surprises.
karten.funktion: May attack again immediately if the first attack succeeds.

karten.name: Garn, the Golem Keeper
karten.beschreibung: A mighty guardian made of ancient stones. Silent but unstoppable.
karten.funktion: May block one card completely once per game.

karten.name: Aeris, the Wind Blade
karten.beschreibung: A flying warrior with razor-sharp blades and lightning-fast movements.
karten.funktion: Can attack before the opponent, regardless of turn order.

karten.name: Zirrus, the Cloud Weaver
karten.beschreibung: A clever mage who shapes clouds and makes enemies vanish in mist.
karten.funktion: Can return a card from the field back to the hand.

karten.name: Rafal, the Storm Caller
karten.beschreibung: A fearless messenger of thunder who unleashes storms whenever he fights.
karten.funktion: Reduces the defense of all Fire cards by -1.

karten.name: Flissa, the Feather Swift
karten.beschreibung: Her steps barely touch the ground. Fast, graceful, and hard to catch.
karten.funktion: Can automatically dodge one attack per game.

karten.name: Ström, the Glide Rider
karten.beschreibung: A daring rider of air currents, faster than the eye can see.
karten.funktion: Can force the opponent to choose a new card.

karten.name: Brisa, the Wind Healer
karten.beschreibung: Gentle as a breeze, she brings healing through her song.
karten.funktion: Heals 2 points on any own card.

karten.name: Orak, the Air Knight
karten.beschreibung: A noble knight with winged armor who watches over the clouds.
karten.funktion: When combined with a Water card, both gain +1 speed.

karten.name: Whispa, the Air Child
karten.beschreibung: A mischievous wind spirit, barely visible but always felt.
karten.funktion: At the start of the game, may look at one opponent’s card.

karten.name: Tempra, the Storm Blade
karten.beschreibung: A warrior who dances with the storm and spins her blade in circles.
karten.funktion: Can attack two cards at once if the opponent is Water.

karten.name: Nebulo, the Mist Shaper
karten.beschreibung: Cloaks the battlefield in mist and confusion, causing enemies to lose focus.
karten.funktion: Reduces the intelligence of all opponents by -1 while in play.

karten.name: Yara, the Wind Caller
karten.beschreibung: With drums, she calls the wind and dances with the gusts.
karten.funktion: Lets you draw a card if you lose.

karten.name: Haku, the Eagle Seer
karten.beschreibung: A wise air shaman whose gaze reaches to the horizon.
karten.funktion: May look at a card from the draw pile before the turn.

karten.name: Venturo, the Whirl Master
karten.beschreibung: A master of air whirls who drills through enemies with wind spheres.
karten.funktion: Deals +2 damage against Earth cards.
